title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 37.2 - Limitations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 37.2 - Limitations

State Regulations
A bank or trust company's investment in any one community
development project pursuant to this Part may not exceed two percent of its
capital stock, surplus and undivided profits and its aggregate investment in
all such projects may not exceed ten percent of its capital stock, surplus and
undivided profits. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
37.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
